title: paNivEn murugA
sahitya:
paNivEn murugA unai tuNai puriyak-kOri nAn


anupallavi

  taNikait-talam tEDi un iNaiyaDi nADi paNiyum anaivaraiyum aNaiyum ayyanE


caraNam    enai ATkoNDu en vinaiyEdum inimEl tinai aLavEnum endat-tollaiyum tandiDAmal
unadu manam enpAl kainiduruga vENumena punitamAna undan ponnaDi tanaip-pOTri
